description:
SecuStore 2 is the successor of the popular password manager / secure storage utility SecuStore. Built especially for webOS 3.0 SecuStore 2 takes full advantage of the larger screensize of the TouchPad and brings usability and efficiency to a new level.

Unique features like the auto insert tool & the built-in password generator make SecuStore 2 the most powerful password manager for webOS. And its absolute flexibility allows you to use it for much more than just storing passwords.

SecuStore 2 keeps your data safe by encrypting it with the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) cipher.

* Keep your data organized! You can split your data into multiple Sets with individual master passwords.

* The built-in password generator makes coming up with new, strong passwords easy.

* The Auto Insert feature allows you to conveniently access your online accounts with only a few taps! ('Advanced Browser for webOS' needed, available via the webOS app catalog)

* Prevent data loss by backing up your sets or transfer your data between devices.

* Store any kind of data by creating your own customized templates!

* Import data from other apps using SecuStores ability to import any kind of csv file!

* Use just type to quickly find the Item your looking for!

* Take full advantage of the TouchPads screensize! SecuStore 2 uses webOS' unique UI elements to give you full control over your data!

SecuStore is supported by Save/Restore from webOS internals which makes for a very easy backup procedure. Check out Save/Restore via Preware!
